name: Sticky Notes
description:
"A PUZZLE A DAY"

Game Features


--Pure hand-painted interface and kitties.

--Cute Cats

--Daily Jigsaws

--More than 15 kinds of stickers ,relax your body and mind to have fun with them!
--Help improve working and studying efficiency
--enjoy relaxing music
--All you have to do is assembling the cube into the right postion,three chapters now but more will be added future.
--Still making more types of stickers and cats
